about_the_game:
The awe-inspiring Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen Masterworks Collection soundtrack contains 53 songs including a handful of alternate versions not included in the original game.

The 2+ hour soundtrack has been reauthored from the original source material. Formats include MP3 (V0 + 320kbps), FLAC (16-bit + 24-bit), and AAC (VBR).
